application.doc: Retrieving the status of the runtime profile

method.name: GET
method.doc: This service is used to retrieve the status of the runtime profile of the appliance, including the time at which the profile was last started.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

200 OK Content-Type:application/json { "last_start":137100188, "last_reload":137160188, "message":"WGAWA0311I The server is available", "return_code":0, "restart_required":false, "reload_required":false }

param.name: last_start
param.doc: The time/date (in seconds since Epoch) that the profile was last started.

param.name: last_reload
param.doc: The time/date (in seconds since Epoch) that the profile was last reloaded.

param.name: return_code
param.doc: 0 indicates that the server is running, and 1 indicates that the server is not running.

param.name: restart_required
param.doc: Indicates if any changes to the configuration been made that require the server to be restarted.

param.name: reload_required
param.doc: Indicates if any changes to the configuration been made that require the server to be reloaded.
